items.title: ADF: Employees Can’t Be Forced To Lie About Pronouns At Work
items.description: Employees don't have to insist on calling people by pronouns they don’t like. But they don’t have to say something they know is not true.

items.title: Deportation Is The Only ‘Due Process’ Illegal Aliens Deserve
items.description: How can there be a legal injury in removing a citizen of Somalia, Venezuela, Afghanistan, Mexico, or any other country, from the U.S.?

items.title: Trans Lawyer Who Asked SCOTUS To Redefine ‘Sex’ Can’t Produce A Definition When Asked
items.description: Trans-identifying lawyer Chase Strangio couldn't present a coherent definition of 'sex' without resorting to feelings and ideological babble.
